channel.title: Business News
channel.description: news, comment and analysis on personal finance, Your Money guides, and UK house price search

item.title: Windows sales 'please' Microsoft
item.description: Microsoft says it is pleased with the demand for Windows 7 as it reports an 18% fall in quarterly profits.

item.title: HD demand boosts BSkyB profit
item.description: BSkyB reports a 40% rise in first quarter profits, helped by strong demand from new customers for high definition viewing.

item.title: Fight for the future of fishermen
item.description: Young fishermen in Scotland face an uncertain future, with fish prices plummeting, but one group is fighting to change that.

item.title: Nokia 'seeking Apple royalties'
item.description: Mobile phone maker Nokia's bid to sue Apple is aimed at trying to extract royalty payments, an analyst suggests.

item.title: Obama hails companies' pay cuts
item.description: Barack Obama welcomes plans to force some US firms which accepted government bail-outs to cut executive pay.
